titles.title: Drone Operator Safety Act of 2017
Drone Operator Safety Act of 2017
To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide for the punishment of unsafe operation of unmanned aircraft, and for other purposes.
Drone Operator Safety Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.
